display_long_description:
Experience the game called one of the most terrifying experiences in VR. What an excellent day for an exorcism!  Now enhanced for Quest 3 and optimized for Quest 2 headsets. Described as one of the most disturbing experiences available for virtual reality, The Exorcist: Legion features FIVE connected stories and features a variety of demonic entities, exorcism tools, hidden artifacts and atmospheric locations. 

[media]
[media]

The Exorcist: Legion Epilogue Update brings new content that extends the ending of this VR horror classic. Complete all five chapters to access this new update.

[media]
Delve deep into the heart of the supernatural as you learn the trade of demonic exorcism and uncover secrets leading you towards a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. Are you brave enough?

[media]
[media]

The Exorcist: Legion is part action, part mystery, part puzzle-solving... and ALL terror.

[media]
--------------------------------------------------
The Exorcist III and all related characters and elements are trademarks of and © Morgan Creek Film Partners I, and LegionVR, LLC, a Fun Train company.  Trademarks belong to their respective owners. All Rights Reserved.
